build.extra_flags: -D BOARD_HAS_PSRAM -D WLED_USE_PSRAM_JSON -D WLED_DISABLE_ALEXA -D WLED_DISABLE_HUESYNC -D WLED_USE_ETHERNET -D LEDPIN=2 -D IRPIN=35 -D SERVERNAME='"Sunny WLED"' -D UM_AUDIOREACTIVE_ENABLE -D SR_DMTYPE=5 -D I2S_WSPIN=13 -D I2S_SDPIN=34 -D AUDIOPIN=36
build.comment: variant ttgo-t7-v14-mini32 is some wrover thing. esp32-sunnyesp-v03 is actually intended but needs a custom variant created. Also, audioreactive is not compatible with DMX -D WLED_ENABLE_DMX for some reason *shocked*
